channel.title: ProxyChains vs Whonix
channel.description: Hey im Kind of Confused i used to use tor and proxychains along time ago and i just started using whonix and i relized that every so often my ip will change just like proxychains but my question is: Does whonix already use proxychains and if not what is the benefit of me using them with whonix i read the doc already and i couldnt find my answer i also read the risk of using a proxy/vpn/ssh.

item.title: ProxyChains vs Whonix
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
See:
https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Comparison_Of_Tor_with_CGI_Proxies,_Proxy_Chains,_and_VPN_Services#Tor_and_Proxy_Chains_Comparison

WOXY:

Does whonix already use proxychains

No. And since this is such a basic design decision, if that would be the case, that would mentioned on wiki/Main_Page, wiki/FAQ and/or easily discoverable on search engines.

Read full topic
